auth.login_subtitle: Align your spirit with the stars
auth.register_subtitle: Begin your cosmic journey by creating an account
auth.missing_records_alert: Please provide both email and password to enter the Oracle.
auth.access_denied_msg: Your credentials did not align with our records. Please try again.
auth.missing_info_msg: Please provide at least your name, email and password.
auth.registration_failed_msg: The stars did not align for your registration. Please check your inputs.
auth.insufficient_balance_msg: Please infuse your balance to continue.

home.palm_desc: Unfold the map of your lifeline

palm.title: Chiromancy
palm.subtitle: Let the Oracle read the map of your existence
palm.instruction_1: Place your right palm in the camera's eye
palm.instruction_2: Ensure the lines are illuminated and clear
palm.instruction_3: Hold steady as the vision crystallizes
palm.vision_obscured_msg: The celestial connection was interrupted. Please try again.

coffee.title: Tasseography
coffee.subtitle: Discover the secrets in the settled grounds
coffee.instruction_1: Take 2-3 photos looking deep into the cup
coffee.instruction_2: Capture multiple angles for a complete vision
coffee.instruction_3: Focus clearly on the shapes and patterns
coffee.vision_clouded_msg: The grounds are silent. Please try another capture.

wallet.infusion_subtitle: Enter the amount of essence to summon into your account
wallet.note: All transactions are encrypted in eternal stardust.
wallet.invalid_amount_msg: Please specify a valid amount of essence to infuse.
wallet.infusion_success_msg: Your celestial balance has been replenished.
wallet.infusion_failed_msg: Failed to infuse essence. Check your connection to the cosmos.

history.title: Archives of Destiny
history.subtitle: Your past journeys through the stars
history.empty_sub: Begin your journey by seeking a reading.

camera.permission_msg: The Oracle needs your vision (camera permission).
